item.description:
Weather is not cooperating. It will be Ziti.
We have Gloria bringing Green salad, and Sharon bringing the Italian bread...
Still could use appetizer, dessert, beverage.
What will you bring?




was:

Not enough attending to make the Steak Out plans... so we're rescheduling for Sunday evening... I know it's Mother's Day, but not all of us are moms or have moms nearby, so you might be free...

Weather permitting, we'll fire up the grill for burgers and dogs. If it's not nice, we'll do a baked ziti.


was:

Linda and Ralph will be firing up the grill to prepare an entree, what can you bring to round out the menu.

After we eat, we'll plan our upcoming activities.

This event is in a private home in Middletown, so you must RSVP to get directions.
item.name: Potluck dinner ** Rescheduled **
